description.value:
A Referral Note communicates pertinent information from a provider who is requesting services of another provider of clinical or non-clinical services. The information in this document includes the reason for the referral and additional information that would augment decision making and care delivery.
Examples of referral situations are: * When a patient is referred from a family physician to a cardiologist for cardiac evaluation. * When patient is sent by a cardiologist to an emergency department for angina. * When a patient is referred by a nurse practitioner to an audiologist for hearing screening. * When a patient is referred by a hospitalist to social services.

definition.value: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] type, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ReferralDocumentType http://hl7.org/fhir/ccda/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.2.3 DYNAMIC (CONF:2219-1365).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] section (CONF:2219-2057) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1364) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-2079).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="48765-2" Allergies and Adverse Reactions (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-2080).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-2081).

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core AllergyIntolerance Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-allergyintolerance) (CONF:2219-2244). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core MedicationStatement Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-medicationstatement) (CONF:2219-2245). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Condition Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-condition) (CONF:2219-2246). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core ObservationResults Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-observationresults) (CONF:2219-2247). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] FamilyMemberHistory (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/FamilyMemberHistory) (CONF:2219-2248). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Condition Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-condition) (CONF:2219-2471). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Immunization Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-immunization) (CONF:2219-2249). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Procedure Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-procedure) (CONF:2219-2251). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core SmokingStatus Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-smokingstatus) (CONF:2219-2452). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core VitalSigns Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-vitalsigns) (CONF:2219-2250).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1369) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1372).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="10160-0" History of Medication Use (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1373).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1374).
